meaningMnemonic: If you <radical>loiter</radical> around my <radical>skin</radical>, <kanji>he</kanji> will get angry at you. He's my very protective friend, and you don't wanna make him angry!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>He</kanji> may get grumpy if you loiter around my skin, but a well-made <reading>curry</reading> (かれ) always brightens his mood. So give him some curry.
